entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Saint John
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:52 AM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint John Airport 08:00 AM AST Saturday 21 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -4.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -5.8°C
Wind: NNW 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 21 January 2023
